sample_sqls: SELECT EQUIP_ID, EQP_NAME, EQUIP_TYPE, AREA_CD, STATUS FROM MES_EQUIP WHERE STATUS = 'ACTIVE'
SELECT E.EQUIP_ID, E.EQP_NAME, S.STAT_CD, S.START_DT FROM MES_EQUIP E LEFT JOIN MES_EQUIP_STAT S ON E.EQUIP_ID = S.EQUIP_ID WHERE E.AREA_CD = 'FAB1'
SELECT AREA_CD, COUNT(*) as EQUIP_CNT FROM MES_EQUIP GROUP BY AREA_CD ORDER BY EQUIP_CNT DESC
SELECT EQUIP_ID, EQP_NAME, INSTALL_DT FROM MES_EQUIP WHERE EQUIP_TYPE = 'PHOTO' AND STATUS = 'ACTIVE'
SELECT LOT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_ID, LOT_STATUS, CREATE_DT FROM MES_LOT_MST WHERE LOT_STATUS = 'RUN'
SELECT L.LOT_ID, L.PRODUCT_NAME, H.PROC_ID, H.STATUS FROM MES_LOT_MST L INNER JOIN MES_LOT_HIS H ON L.LOT_ID = H.LOT_ID WHERE L.PRIORITY = 'HIGH'
SELECT PRODUCT_NAME, COUNT(*) as LOT_CNT FROM MES_LOT_MST WHERE CREATE_DT >= SYSDATE - 7 GROUP BY PRODUCT_NAME
SELECT LOT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, LOT_STATUS FROM MES_LOT_MST WHERE LOT_STATUS IN ('RUN', 'HOLD') ORDER BY PRIORITY DESC
SELECT EQUIP_ID, PROC_ID, IS_MAIN, RECIPE_ID FROM MES_EQUIP_PROC WHERE IS_MAIN = 'Y'
SELECT EP.EQUIP_ID, E.EQP_NAME, EP.PROC_ID, P.PROC_NAME FROM MES_EQUIP_PROC EP INNER JOIN MES_EQUIP E ON EP.EQUIP_ID = E.EQUIP_ID INNER JOIN MES_PROC_MST P ON EP.PROC_ID = P.PROC_ID
SELECT PROC_ID, COUNT(*) as EQUIP_CNT FROM MES_EQUIP_PROC GROUP BY PROC_ID ORDER BY EQUIP_CNT DESC
SELECT EQUIP_ID, PROC_ID, RECIPE_ID FROM MES_EQUIP_PROC WHERE PROC_ID = 'PHOTO_01'
SELECT LOT_ID, WAFER_ID, WFR_STATUS, CREATE_DT FROM MES_WFR_MST WHERE WFR_STATUS = 'GOOD'
SELECT W.LOT_ID, W.WAFER_ID, L.PRODUCT_NAME, W.WFR_STATUS FROM MES_WFR_MST W INNER JOIN MES_LOT_MST L ON W.LOT_ID = L.LOT_ID WHERE W.WFR_STATUS IN ('GOOD', 'HOLD')
SELECT LOT_ID, COUNT(*) as WFR_CNT FROM MES_WFR_MST GROUP BY LOT_ID
SELECT WFR_STATUS, COUNT(*) as CNT FROM MES_WFR_MST WHERE CREATE_DT >= SYSDATE - 30 GROUP BY WFR_STATUS
SELECT EQUIP_ID, STAT_CD, STAT_TYP, START_DT, END_DT FROM MES_EQUIP_STAT WHERE STAT_TYP = 'Down' AND START_DT > SYSDATE - 7
SELECT E.EQUIP_ID, E.EQP_NAME, S.STAT_CD, S.START_DT, S.END_DT FROM MES_EQUIP E JOIN MES_EQUIP_STAT S ON E.EQUIP_ID = S.EQUIP_ID WHERE S.STAT_CD = 'DOWN'
SELECT EQUIP_ID, STAT_CD, SUM(DURATION_MIN) as TOTAL_DURATION FROM MES_EQUIP_STAT WHERE START_DT >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') GROUP BY EQUIP_ID, STAT_CD ORDER BY TOTAL_DURATION DESC

SELECT EQUIP_ID, COUNT(*) as DOWN_CNT, AVG(DURATION_MIN) as AVG_DOWN_TIME FROM MES_EQUIP_STAT WHERE STAT_TYP = 'Down' AND START_DT >= TO_DATE('2026-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY EQUIP_ID HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT LOT_ID, PROC_ID, EQUIP_ID, TRACK_IN_DT, TRACK_OUT_DT, STATUS FROM MES_LOT_HIS WHERE LOT_ID = 'LOT20260108001'
SELECT L.LOT_ID, L.PROC_ID, P.PROC_NAME, L.TRACK_OUT_DT - L.TRACK_IN_DT as CYCLE_TIME FROM MES_LOT_HIS L INNER JOIN MES_PROC_MST P ON L.PROC_ID = P.PROC_ID WHERE L.STATUS = 'COMPLETE'

SELECT PROC_ID, COUNT(DISTINCT LOT_ID) as LOT_CNT, AVG((TRACK_OUT_DT - TRACK_IN_DT) * 24 * 60) as AVG_CT_MIN FROM MES_LOT_HIS WHERE TRACK_OUT_DT IS NOT NULL AND TRACK_IN_DT >= SYSDATE - 7 GROUP BY PROC_ID
SELECT L.LOT_ID, L.EQUIP_ID, E.EQP_NAME, L.STATUS FROM MES_LOT_HIS L LEFT JOIN MES_EQUIP E ON L.EQUIP_ID = E.EQUIP_ID WHERE L.STATUS = 'HOLD'
SELECT PROC_ID, PROC_NAME, PROC_TYPE, STEP_SEQ, TARGET_CT FROM MES_PROC_MST WHERE PROC_TYPE = 'FRONT' ORDER BY STEP_SEQ
SELECT P.PROC_ID, P.PROC_NAME, COUNT(L.LOT_ID) as LOT_CNT FROM MES_PROC_MST P LEFT JOIN MES_LOT_HIS L ON P.PROC_ID = L.PROC_ID GROUP BY P.PROC_ID, P.PROC_NAME
SELECT PROC_ID, PROC_NAME, TARGET_CT FROM MES_PROC_MST WHERE TARGET_CT > 60 ORDER BY TARGET_CT DESC
SELECT PROC_TYPE, COUNT(*) as PROC_CNT, AVG(TARGET_CT) as AVG_CT FROM MES_PROC_MST GROUP BY PROC_TYPE
SELECT LOT_ID, WAFER_ID, BIN_CODE, GOOD_DIE_CNT, TOTAL_DIE_CNT FROM MES_WFR_BIN WHERE BIN_CODE IN ('PASS', 'FAIL')
SELECT W.LOT_ID, W.WAFER_ID, W.BIN_CODE, L.PRODUCT_NAME FROM MES_WFR_BIN W INNER JOIN MES_LOT_MST L ON W.LOT_ID = L.LOT_ID WHERE W.BIN_CODE = 'PASS'
SELECT LOT_ID, SUM(GOOD_DIE_CNT) as TOTAL_GOOD, SUM(TOTAL_DIE_CNT) as TOTAL_DIE, ROUND(SUM(GOOD_DIE_CNT) * 100.0 / SUM(TOTAL_DIE_CNT), 2) as YIELD FROM MES_WFR_BIN GROUP BY LOT_ID
SELECT BIN_CODE, COUNT(*) as WFR_CNT, AVG(GOOD_DIE_CNT) as AVG_GOOD FROM MES_WFR_BIN WHERE CREATE_DT >= SYSDATE - 7 GROUP BY BIN_CODE
SELECT LOT_ID, WAFER_ID, DEFECT_CODE, DEFECT_CNT, INSP_DT FROM MES_DEF_HIS WHERE DEFECT_CNT > 0 ORDER BY DEFECT_CNT DESC
SELECT D.LOT_ID, D.WAFER_ID, D.DEFECT_CODE, L.PRODUCT_NAME FROM MES_DEF_HIS D INNER JOIN MES_LOT_MST L ON D.LOT_ID = L.LOT_ID WHERE D.DEFECT_CODE = 'PARTICLE'
SELECT DEFECT_CODE, COUNT(*) as DEF_CNT, SUM(DEFECT_CNT) as TOTAL_DEFECTS FROM MES_DEF_HIS WHERE INSP_DT >= SYSDATE - 30 GROUP BY DEFECT_CODE ORDER BY TOTAL_DEFECTS DESC
SELECT LOT_ID, COUNT(DISTINCT DEFECT_CODE) as DEFECT_TYPES, SUM(DEFECT_CNT) as TOTAL_CNT FROM MES_DEF_HIS GROUP BY LOT_ID HAVING SUM(DEFECT_CNT) > 100
